items.name: The "Original" Silicone Bubble Calculator
items.description: The "Original" silicone bubble calculators feature raised "pillow" keys that bring a new standard of comfort and ergonomic design to your computations. Large 8-digit LCD display features magnifier window and automatically turns off when not in use to preserve battery life. Performs all standard operations with memory function. Operates on one button cell battery (LR1130) included. The Vantiv logo is imprinted in white.

items.name: Original Fabric Mousepad
items.description: Original Fabric Mousepad. Available in Blue, Orange, Purple and Teal with the Vantiv logo imprinted in white.

items.name: Anvil Short Sleeve Men's T-shirt
items.description: 4.5 oz., pre-shrunk 90/10 cotton/polyester t-shirt has shoulder-to-shoulder taping, double-needle stitched sleeves and bottom hem with a TearAway label. The Vantiv logo is imprinted on full front of t-shirt.

items.name: Port AuthorityÂ® Easy Care Cap
items.description: Ultimate uniforming cap featuring all easy care qualities you love. Fabric is 65/35 poly/cotton. Structured, mid profile with closure cap. Available with Vantiv logo in white.

items.name: Sport Tek Pullover Hooded Sweatshirt
items.description: This athletic style, 9-ounce, 65/35 ring spun combed cotton/poly fleece hooded sweatshirt has rib knit cuffs and waistband, set-in sleeves, a twill-taped neck and a front pouch pocket. Vantiv logo is embroidered on the left chest.
